bibl.title: A Christian amulet and estate administrators in seventh century Fayum.
bibl.note: Edition of P. Colon. Inv. 521a verso [recto = van Haelst 899; Marganne 98; LDAB 6283]. Letter addressed to Kalomenas, vicedominus of a large estate in the Fayum around the time of the Islamic conquest. - Appendix. Corrections on Published Papyri: SPP 10.152; - P.Eirene 4.44; - SPP 3.647, SPP 8.1139 (= BGU 2.675), SPP 20.199 (= SPP 8.1297) and SPP 8.958; - SPP 20.206.
bibl.seg: Lajos Berkes, A Christian Amulet and Estate Administrators in Seventh Century Fayum.

Edition of P. Colon. Inv. 521a verso [recto = van Haelst 899; Marganne 98; LDAB 6283]. Letter addressed to Kalomenas, vicedominus of a large estate in the Fayum around the time of the Islamic conquest. - Appendix. Corrections on Published Papyri: SPP 10.152; - P.Eirene 4.44; - SPP 3.647, SPP 8.1139 (= BGU 2.675), SPP 20.199 (= SPP 8.1297) and SPP 8.958; - SPP 20.206.
